restaurants.name: Gajali Restaurant
restaurants.description: Famous for its coastal Maharashtrian cuisine and specialties like Surmai Fry and Crab Masala.

restaurants.name: Sigree Global Grill
restaurants.description: Renowned for its buffet spread featuring global cuisines with live grilling stations and tandoor specialties.

restaurants.name: Urban Tadka
restaurants.description: Popular for its authentic North Indian dishes like Butter Chicken and Amritsari Kulcha.

restaurants.name: Mainland China
restaurants.description: Authentic Chinese cuisine with favorites like Dimsums and Peking Duck in an elegant setting.

restaurants.name: Barbeque Nation
restaurants.description: Popular for its unlimited grilled starters and extensive buffet spread with live counters.

restaurants.name: Panchavati Gaurav
restaurants.description: Authentic Maharashtrian thali restaurant with traditional dishes and homely atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Dakshin
restaurants.description: Premium South Indian restaurant offering authentic dishes from all Southern states.

restaurants.name: Pop Tate's
restaurants.description: Popular for its burgers, sizzlers, and American-style comfort food in a casual setting.

restaurants.name: Sadichha
restaurants.description: Local favorite for authentic Malvani seafood with specialties like Surmai Thali.

restaurants.name: The Fern
restaurants.description: Elegant dining at Hotel Fortune with a variety of cuisines and fine dining experience.
